verbose_text: RT-PCR, real-time PCR and ELISA showed that siRNA knockdowns of XBP-1, CHOP, or ATF6 significantly blocked ER stress induced MUC5AC mRNA expression and glycoprotein production (XREF_FIG - XREF_FIG) although inhibition by XBP-1 siRNA was greatest (XREF_FIG - XREF_FIG), and inhibition by CHOP siRNA was weakest (XREF_FIG - XREF_FIG).
